title: Changes to WvW API with HoT

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
There’s gonna be some new /v2/wvw endpoints to support new features and fix outstanding issues. Will be working on them this week, check the github issue tracker for details.

Hoping to release them late this month or early next, we’ll see what catches fire.

comments.author: Pink Ninja Man.4375
comments.body:
Hi I was wondering if there will be changes to the WvW API with the HoT release. Specifically will we be able to see all the information that clicking on an objective will do in game like what tier the objective is at and how long until the next one is reached.

Also, if these changes are coming will they be out before HoT launch? It would be nice for new and existing sites to be able to update their sites for the new borderlands before it is out.
